statements: SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address FROM SupplierInformation;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM SupplierInformation ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id = 123;
SELECT supplier_name, email_address FROM SupplierInformation WHERE email_address IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, contact_number FROM SupplierInformation WHERE payment_terms = 'Net 30' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM SupplierInformation WHERE supplier_id IN (1, 2, 3, 4, 5) AND payment_terms LIKE 'Net%';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address FROM SupplierInformation WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL ORDER BY supplier_name, email_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email, payment_terms FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id > 3;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone, payment_terms FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100.50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT products.product_name, suppliers.supplier_name FROM products INNER JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, address FROM Suppliers;
SELECT product_name, supplier_id, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, order_date FROM Suppliers JOIN Products ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Products.supplier_id JOIN Orders ON Suppliers.supplier_id = Orders.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, email, phone_number, address FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, email, phone_number, address, payment_terms FROM Suppliers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, description, price FROM Products WHERE price > 100 AND price < 500;

SELECT Orders.order_id, Orders.order_date, Suppliers.supplier_name, Products.product_name, Orders.quantity, Orders.total_amount FROM Orders INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Orders.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id INNER JOIN Products ON Orders.product_id = Products.product_id ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number, email FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT payment_date, amount, payment_method FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, phone_number FROM suppliers ORDER BY phone_number DESC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT orders.order_id, orders.total_price, payments.amount, payments.payment_date FROM orders INNER JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id ORDER BY orders.total_price DESC
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, payment_terms FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM products JOIN suppliers ON products.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, product_name FROM orders JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM suppliers WHERE contact_phone = '+1234567890';
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, addresses.city FROM suppliers INNER JOIN addresses ON suppliers.supplier_id = addresses.supplier_id;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
